message: I propose a fair split, 90% for me and 10% for you. What do you say?
Your offer was a bit greedy Alice. Let's be reasonable, I propose a 80/20 split.
Okay, let's try a 85/15 split this time.  I'm willing to compromise a little, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me.
This is getting us nowhere Alice. 70/30 is my final offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one. Let's do a 75/25 split.  This is the best I can offer, given the inflation.
